main event: A civilian co-pilot and passenger observed a fireball while flying over Melbourne, Florida.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 35-40 seconds., The object was initially estimated at 23,000 feet., The object maintained a horizontal course and was traveling at a very high rate of speed., Other crew members from National Airlines flights also reported similar sightings., The visibility at the time of the sighting was stated to be unlimited.
witness description: Civilians including a co-pilot and a passenger of a National Airlines flight.
